properties.areaDesc: Inner waters from Point Mugu to San Mateo Pt. CA including Santa Catalina and Anacapa Islands
properties.headline: Small Craft Advisory issued February 5 at 3:03AM PST until February 5 at 9:00AM PST by NWS Los Angeles/Oxnard CA
properties.description:
* WHAT...Hazardous winds and sea conditions.

* WHERE...Inner waters from Point Mugu to San Mateo Pt. CA
including Santa Catalina and Anacapa Islands.

* WHEN...Until 9 AM PST this morning.

* IMPACTS...Conditions will be hazardous to small craft.

* ADDITIONAL DETAILS...Winds will be strongest from Point Mugu to
Santa Monica and out to near Santa Barbara Island. See the
Coastal Waters Forecast (CWFLOX).
properties.instruction:
Inexperienced mariners, especially those operating smaller
vessels, should avoid navigating in hazardous conditions.

NWSheadline: SMALL CRAFT ADVISORY REMAINS IN EFFECT UNTIL 9 AM PST THIS MORNING
